There is an acute

			 United States in order to effectively combat severe forms of trafficking in
			 persons.

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act
		  of 1968 to include human trafficking as a part 1 violent crime for purposes of
		  the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program.
